Reference

Teal Core Functions

These are the main functions needed to build a teal app.

bookmarkableShinyApp()

Make a Shiny UI function bookmarkable

init()

Create the Server and UI Function For the Shiny App

module() toString(<teal_module>) print(<teal_module>)

Creates a module with a new shiny page

modules() toString(<teal_modules>) print(<teal_modules>)

Create a collection of module and modules object

srv_teal_with_splash()

Server function that loads the data through reactive loading and then delegates to srv_teal.

ui_teal_with_splash()

UI to show a splash screen in the beginning, then delegate to srv_teal

Teal Filtering and Selecting

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

add_no_selected_choices()

Add empty choice to choices selected

all_choices()

An S3 structure representing the selection of all possible choices in a filter_spec, select_spec or choices_selected object.

choices_labeled() print(<choices_labeled>)

Set "<choice>:<label>" type of Names

choices_selected() is.choices_selected()

Choices Selected

data_extract_spec()

Data Extract input for teal modules

filter_spec()

Data extract filter specification

select_spec() select_spec.delayed_data() select_spec.default()

Column selection input specification

value_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variable values basing on other variable values

variable_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variables basing on existing labels in data

Teal filter-panel API

Functions used to modify filter-panel states.

set_filter_state() get_filter_state() remove_filter_state() clear_filter_states()

Managing FilteredData states

Teal modules UI

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

optionalSelectInput()

Hide, Show Label only or display a pickerInput

optionalSliderInput()

if min or max are NA then the slider widget will be hidden

optionalSliderInputValMinMax()

For teal modules we parameterize an optionalSliderInput with one argument value_min_max

updateOptionalSelectInput()

Update optionalSelectInput

Delayed Dataset Constructors

For creating delayed dataset objects.

cdisc_dataset()

Create a new object of CDISCTealDataset class

cdisc_dataset_file()

Load CDISCTealDataset object from a file

dataset()

S3 method to construct an MAETealDataset object from MultiAssayExperiment

dataset_file()

Load TealDataset object from a file

mae_dataset()

The constructor of MAETealDataset

Delayed Dataset Connectors Constructors

For creating delayed dataset connector objects.

cdisc_data_connector()

The constructor of CDISCTealDataConnector objects.

cdisc_dataset_connector()

Create a new CDISCTealDatasetConnector object

dataset_connector_file() cdisc_dataset_connector_file()

Load TealDatasetConnector object from a file

code_dataset_connector() code_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Code TealDatasetConnector

csv_dataset_connector() csv_cdisc_dataset_connector()

csv TealDatasetConnector

data_connection()

The constructor for TealDataConnection class.

dataset_connector()

Create a new TealDatasetConnector object

fun_dataset_connector() fun_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Function Dataset Connector

python_dataset_connector() python_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Python TealDatasetConnector

rds_dataset_connector() rds_cdisc_dataset_connector()

RDS TealDatasetConnector

relational_data_connector()

The constructor for TealDataConnector class.

scda_dataset_connector() scda_cdisc_dataset_connector()

scda TealDatasetConnector

script_dataset_connector() script_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Script TealDatasetConnector

Delayed Data Constructors

For creating delayed data objects.

cdisc_data()

Data input for teal app

cdisc_data_file()

Load CDISCTealData object from a file

cdse_data()

Superseded (moved into separate package): TealDataConnector connector for CDSE

teal_data()

Teal data

teal_data_file()

Load TealData object from a file

Delayed Dataset Functions

For loading and modifying delayed data objects.

as_cdisc()

Convert a TealDataset(Connector) object to a CDISCTealDataset(Connector) object

callable_code()

Create CallableCode object

callable_function()

Create CallableFunction object

get_attrs()

Get dataset attributes

get_cdisc_keys()

Function that returns the default keys for a CDISC dataset by name

get_code()

Get code

get_dataname()

S3 method for getting a dataname(s) of (TealDataAbstract, (TealDatasetConnector or TealDataset) R6 object

get_dataset()

Get dataset from TealDatasetConnector

get_dataset_label()

S3 method for getting a label of (TealDatasetConnector or TealDataset) R6 object

get_datasets()

Get a TealDataset objects.

get_keys()

Get dataset primary keys

get_raw_data()

Retrieve raw data

is_pulled()

Is pulled

load_dataset()

Load data from connection

load_datasets()

Load datasets

mutate_data()

Mutate data by code

mutate_dataset()

Mutate dataset by code

mutate_join_keys()

Mutate JoinKeys with a new values

resolve_delayed()

Resolve delayed inputs by evaluating the code within the provided datasets

set_args()

Set arguments of a CallableFunction

set_keys()

Set dataset primary keys

Helpers

Other useful functions for users and developers.

data_label()

Get dataset label attribute

`data_label<-`()

Set dataset label attribute

default_filter()

Refers the default filter state

get_filter_expr()

Gets filter expression for multiple datanames taking into account its order.

get_key_duplicates()

S3 generic for creating an information summary about the duplicate key values in a dataset

get_variable_labels()

Extracts column labels from a dataset

get_labels()

Extracts dataset and variable labels from a dataset.

join_key()

Create a relationship between a pair of datasets

join_keys()

Create a JoinKeys out of a list of JoinKeySet objects

log_app_usage()

Teal Application Usage Logging.

no_selected_as_NULL()

Check select choices for no choice made

python_code()

Python Code

read_script()

Read .R file into character

split_by_sep()

Split by separator

variable_labels()

Extracts column labels from a dataset.

`variable_labels<-`()

Sets the column labels of a data.frame.

For Developers

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

R6 Classes

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

CallableCode

A CallableCode class of objects Object that stores code to reproduce an object. It includes methods to get or run the code and return the object.

CallablePythonCode

A CallablePythonCode class of objects

CDISCTealData

Manage multiple CDISCTealDataConnector, CDISCTealDatasetConnector and CDISCTealDataset objects.

CDISCTealDataConnector

Manage multiple and TealDatasetConnector of the same type.

CDISCTealDataset

R6 Class representing a dataset with parent attribute

CDISCTealDatasetConnector

A CDISCTealDatasetConnector class of objects

CDISCFilteredData

Class to encapsulate relational filtered datasets with its parents.

CDISCFilteredDataset

CDISCFilteredDataset R6 class

DefaultFilteredDataset

DefaultFilteredDataset R6 class

FilteredData

Class to encapsulate filtered datasets

FilteredDataset

FilterStates R6 class

JoinKeys

R6 Class to store relationships for joining datasets

MAEFilteredDataset

MAEFilteredDataset R6 class

MAETealDataset

R6 Class representing a MultiAssayExperiment object with its attributes

PythonCodeClass

A CallablePythonCode class of objects

Queue

R6 Class - A First-In-First-Out Abstract Data Type

TealData

Manage multiple TealDataConnector, TealDatasetConnector and TealDataset objects.

TealDataConnection

A TealDataConnection class of objects Objects of this class store the connection to a data source. It can be a database or server connection.

TealDataConnector

Manage multiple and TealDatasetConnector of the same type.

TealDatasetConnector

A TealDatasetConnector class of objects

Logging

Support for logging in a teal application

register_logger()

Registers a logger instance in a given logging namespace.

Deprecated

root_modules()

Deprecated: Creates the root modules container

Superseded

cdse_connection()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Open connection to CDSE

cdse_dataset_connector() cdse_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Superseded (moved into separate package): CDSE TealDatasetConnector

datasetdb_data()

Superseded (moved into separate package): TealDataConnector connector for DataSetDB

datasetdb_connection()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Open connection to DataSetDB

datasetdb_dataset_connector()

Superseded (moved into separate package): DataSetDB TealDatasetConnector

ricepass_connection()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Open connection to entimICE via ricepass

rice_connection()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Open connection to entimICE via rice

rice_dataset_connector() rice_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Rice TealDatasetConnector

rice_data()

Superseded (moved into separate package): TealDataConnector connector for RICE

snowflake_connection()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Open connection to Snowflake

snowflake_connection_function()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Helper function to connect to Snowflake

snowflake_data()

Superseded (moved into separate package): TealDataConnector connector for SNOWFLAKE

snowflake_dataset_connector() snowflake_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Snowflake TealDatasetConnector

teradata_dataset_connector() teradata_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Superseded (moved into separate package): Teradata TealDatasetConnector

teradata_connection()

Superseded (moved into separate package) Open connection to Teradata

teradata_data()

Superseded (moved into separate package): TealDataConnector connector for TERADATA
